# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Provides an array of vertex indices that respresents the geometric primitive at the subscripted index.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc subscript(index: Int) -> [Int32] { get }
```

## Discussion

This subscript operates on geometry elements of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Int32] with `4` [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometryElement/bytesPerIndex]. In the case of the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARMeshGeometry/faces] property, this operator returns an array of size `3`. The contents of the array are vertex indices that compose a triangle primitive, which represents the face identified by the argument face index.

## Accessing Index Data

- **buffer**: A Metal buffer containing primitive data.
